title: Gray's Papaya (Similar to Castaway and Tiki Palms)
content: I need help finding this font. I hope it's not a custom job ![tiki](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143554im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36366.jpg)
author: samiam

comments.content:
That's my corner! And that sign has been there since God left Chicago.   
   
Unfortunately you've already identified the only two Bamboo fonts I know (besides Bamboo which won't help you at all).
Thanks I live fairly close to there also. Near Columbia U.
